name: 梁曉帆
objective: The purpose of the course is for students to learn about theories and research methods of cognitive human factors, and to learn how to apply these theories and methods for investigating and solving practical problems, and improving overall system performance.
schedule:
Week 01: Introduction
Week 02: Module 1-Lecture: Cognitive ergonomics
Week 03: Module 1-Lecture: Axiomatic design
Week 03: Module 1-Exercise: Axiomatic design
Week 04: Module 2-Mental workload: Lecture
Week 05: Holiday (No class)
Week 06: Module 2-Mental workload: Paper reading & discussion
Week 07: Module 2-Mental workload: Practice & presentation
Week 08: Compensatory leave (No class)
Week 09: Module 3-Situation awareness: Lecture
Week 10: Module 3-Situation awareness: Paper reading & discussion
Week 11: Module 3-Situation awareness: Practice & presentation
Week 12: Module 4-Mental model/Card sorting: Lecture
Week 13: Module 4-Mental model/Card sorting: Paper reading & discussion
Week 14: Module 4-Mental model/Card sorting: Practice & presentation
Week 15: Module 5-User experience/Usability testing: Lecture
Week 16: Module 5-User experience/Usability testing:Paper reading & discussion
Week 17: Holiday (No class)
Week 18: Module 5-User experience/Usability testing: Practice & presentation
scorePolicy:
Paper reading & discussion: 40% (10% each)
Practice & presentation: 40% (10% each)
Exercise: 10%
Participation: 10%
